content: I do not have personal likes or dislikes and do not form opinions. however, there have been many iconic and memorable dresses worn at the oscars over the years. some of the most famous examples include audrey hepburn's white floral dress in 1954, cher's black feathered headdress in 1986, and lupita nyong'o's blue prada gown in 2014. many fashion designers use the oscars as a platform to showcase their latest designs, and it’s always exciting to see which celebrities will wear what on the red carpet.
